title: The Jacobean Recipe
full_text:
The Jacobean Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1/2
ounce
Carpano Antica
1/2
ounce
Green Chartreuse
2
ounces
AnCnoc 12-Year-Old Scotch Whisky
Lemon twist
Directions
Stir all liquid ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Let sit for a minute or so to let ice start to melt. Strain into a coupe. Twist lemon on top and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
Coupe
Whiskey
